name: Gensou Garden Monogatari: Daichi Sangyou Yuukarin
storyline:
Is the main character a scary spectre?

No, it's a gentle spectre who loves flowers.

The purpose is to make your own wonderful garden. You are free to turn this large vacant lot into a flower garden or a colourful seasonal orchard.

You can build your own house, and relax and enjoy your slow life.
summary: A peaceful agriculture slow life simulator game. The game purpose is to make your own wonderful garden. You are free to turn this large vacant lot into a flower garden or a colorful seasonal orchard.
